title: T206 Red Hindu Hugh Duffy PSA 4 Highest Graded
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T206 Red Hindu Hugh Duffy PSA 4 Highest Graded
posts.post_content: T206 Red Hindu Hugh Duffy PSA 4, the highest graded by PSA. One graded higher by SGC as 55 that is not nearly as nice(scans can be found on the web). This is in all likelihood, the finest known.

Bumped with lower price, in a rising market!! Still the highest graded and nicest  known Duffy Red Hindu. Payment by Check, MO or Paypal net to me. Price is shipped with signature required covered by private insurance.
